error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '+' but used '-' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 8
On Tuesday Buddy has 30/2 = <<30/2=15>>15 baseball cards.
On Wednesday Buddy has 15-12 = <<15-12=3>>3 baseball cards.
On Thursday Buddy buys 15/3 = <<15/3=5>>5 baseball cards.
On Thursday Buddy has a total of 3+5 = <<3+5=8>>8 baseball cards.
